key_trends: AI training data quality becoming critical bottleneck

competitive_positioning.competitive_moat: Specialized multi-sensor data annotation expertise and workflow optimization for robotics/automotive
competitive_positioning.differentiation: Focus on point cloud and multi-sensor data rather than just image annotation
competitive_vulnerabilities: Large tech companies building in-house solutions

strengths: Strategic market positioning in high-growth autonomous vehicle space
concerns: Dependence on autonomous vehicle market timing

next_steps: Expand team to capture market opportunity
Build deeper moats through proprietary algorithms
